The Battle has ended and you are victorious!
The Battle has ended but you have been defeated!

Earth was once a peaceful civilized place. But then the invaders came, creatures from another world who sought to destroy ours. Countless lifes were lost during the invasion, the enemy almost eradicated mankind. After many battles against these invaders we ended up winning the war, but at the cost of destroying our world. And from the ashes of the old war, three empires standed against each others for what was left of our world.

You were once a soldier before, and now you stand as a general, you may build your own army and fight for the cause of your empire. Your job is to claim as many places that survived the old war, and preserve its resources for your faction, the places you own reward you with extra resources when you collect them. If needed you can attack a place that is claimed by the enemy, but if you wish to spare your army you can steal from the enemy, but stealing does not reward as much as the places your empire owns.

When building your army, you may train whatever units you wish, but there is a limit for how many units you can hold. You can also upgrade them to make your army stronger. Once you deploy a unit in a place then it will be claimed in your name but the units you deployed will not return. You can build structures in a place to allow more units to guard it, to strengthen your army, or to prevent the enemy from benefiting the resources from your place.
One of the most important resources in the game. You can find some food in restaurants, cafes, or any other place related to it.
One of the most important resources in the game. You can find some wood in parks, forests, or any other place that is related to nature.
Not so used as some other resources, but still has great use in the game. You can find some iron in train stations, subway stations or factories.
A bit more used then iron, still with a lot of uses in the game. You can find some stone in beaches or monuments.
Knowledge is power and that is transitioned onto the game with the uses it has. You can find some knowledge in Universities or Museums.
Medicine has less uses then most resources in the game, but the uses it has are very important. You can find some medicine in pharmacies, hospitals and clinics.
The rarest resource in the game, it works a bit like currency. You can find some uranium in casinos.
There are limits to how many troops you can deploy in each territory. The barracks are used to increase the capacity of troops in those territories.
You can only get as many resources from a point, in order to increase the amount of resource from a point belonging to your faction you can deploy a Storage Structure.
Players from other factions already get less resources from points owned by your faction, but with a Vault, you can make that number be even lower.
Each unit has its stats, with the Armory deployed, your units will see an increase in its Attack and Armor stats.
The Medbay will allow your units to have their health stats increased to allow them stay longer in battle.
Every unit has its speed to tell how many enemies they can attack each round. With a Laboratory deployed, your units will see an increase in its speed stat.
One of the first units in the game, lacks in stats, but is very cheap.
One of the first units in the game, a bit stronger then the Archer and cheap, but with different training costs.
This unit is more offensive then the starting ones, but for that strength comes a cost in Health and Armor.
Tank is the most resistant unit in the game, besides having great health and armor stats, it is also very strong, so you have to be careful when attacking a place with one.
This unit is basically a useless unit at level one, but with the upgrades you start getting a real unit that can make some damage in battles.
Very fast and deadly unit, but very easy to kill, so you need to be careful when using them.
Very strong offensively and can do a lot of damage in a battle.
This is a support unit, so it does not attack anyone, instead, it has a chance to heal its allies.
rambo description
This unit throws uses chemical bombs as a weapon, in the battle it can deal damage to units in an area.
This is a support unit, so it does not attack, instead it gives vision of the enemies, which translates to a boost of damage for his allies.
